Unclean: in the southern part of odisha the taratarini temple on the kumari hills at the bank of the rushikulya river near berhampur city in ganjam district here worshiped as the breast shrine  and manifestations of adi shakti the tara tarini shakti peetha is one of the oldest pilgrimage centers of the mother goddess and is one of four major ancient tantra peetha and shakti peethas in india deomali is a mountain peak of the eastern ghats it is located in koraput district this peak with an elevation of about  m is the highest peak in odisha
